snippet: The Times's Rick Berke, an assistant managing editor, moderates a conversation about the 2012 presidential campaign with Richard W. Stevenson, political editor, Jim Rutenberg and Jeff Zeleny, national political correspondents, and Sheryl Gay...
abstract: The Times's Rick Berke, an assistant managing editor, moderates a conversation about the 2012 presidential campaign with Richard W. Stevenson, political editor, Jim Rutenberg and Jeff Zeleny, national political correspondents, and Sheryl Gay Stolberg, political features correspondent.
